passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > header:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(1) > div > h1
html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(2) > article > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > aside:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > aside:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(21) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > iframe
